LanguageData.NY_DragonMilk.label: ambergris
LanguageData.NY_DragonMilk.description: The customarily misnamed "ambergris" is actually the excrement (read: milk) of adult loongs. Highly nutritious and flaverful, it makes good condiment and also suitable for direct consumption.
LanguageData.NY_plant_Ginger.label: loonginger
LanguageData.NY_plant_Ginger.description: A species of ginger brought to rimworld by loongs. Unsuitable for direct consumption, but it is a good condiment.
LanguageData.NY_plant_Lotus.label: loontus root
LanguageData.NY_plant_Lotus.description: A species of lotus that is genetically modified to grow on soil. Its root is rich in starch and fiber, and loongs held the techniques to weave them into silk.
LanguageData.NY_plant_PlumTree.label: plum tree
LanguageData.NY_plant_PlumTree.description: A species of plum tree, will continue to grow after harvest. Loongs often plant a plum tree at their new home, marking the start of a new life.
LanguageData.NY_PlumGingerTea.label: plum ginger milktea
LanguageData.NY_PlumGingerTea.description: A thick and aromatic drink, made from boiling plum and ginger in ambergris (read: loong milk). It's said to be able to warn one up in the winter.
LanguageData.NY_PlumJuice.label: plum juice
LanguageData.NY_PlumJuice.description: A refreshing drink made from boiling plum with berries then let it cool down. It's said to be able to cool one down in the summer.
LanguageData.NY_PreservedPlum.label: preserved plums
LanguageData.NY_PreservedPlum.description: A preserved fruit made with salt and sugar, tastes good and lasts long.
LanguageData.NY_RawGinger.label: loonginger
LanguageData.NY_RawGinger.description: Often simply called ginger, it is the mature root of loonginger plant. Spicy in taste, it makes a common condiment in dishes.
LanguageData.NY_RawLotusRoot.label: loontus root
LanguageData.NY_RawLotusRoot.description: The swollen roots of loontus plants, it is rich in starch and fiber, while having a plain but crispy taste. It is also used in the production of lotus root silk.
LanguageData.NY_RawPlum.label: plum
LanguageData.NY_RawPlum.description: The fruit of a plum tree, can be directly eaten, made into preserves and various drinks.
